title: Pre-game
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the At Bat app
And is viewing their Google Now cards (to view cards swipe up from bottom of screen until you see the Google page)
And there is a game that is in a Preview State
custom_steps: When the user taps on the "Preview" link
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted if they want to open this with At Bat
And if selected will take the user to the Gameday Preview view for the game they tapped on

title: Live game
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the At Bat Lite app
And is viewing their Google Now cards (to view cards swipe up from bottom of screen until you see the Google page)
And there is a game that is in a Live State
custom_steps: When the user taps the Play by Play link
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted if they want to open this with At Bat
And if selected will take the user to the Gameday Pitch by Pitch view for the game they tapped on
And the user will NOT be able to access the Video tab

title: Post-game
custom_preconds:
Given the user has At Bat installed
And the user has not logged in with a premium account
And is viewing their Google Now cards (to view cards swipe up from bottom of screen until you see the Google page)
And there is a game that is in a Final State
custom_steps:
When the user taps Recap & Highlights
OR the user taps Box Score
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted if they want to open this with At Bat
And if selected will take the user to the Gameday Box Score view for the game they tapped on
